form.title: Check your property's eligibility
form.desc:
Off-market marketing at Secretimmo is reserved for exceptional, unique, or luxury properties.
To check if your property meets our criteria, we invite you to take an eligibility test.
Your data is treated with strict confidentiality and is never shared without your consent.
form.secretimmo_title: Congratulations, your property is considered exceptional and could be marketed off-market!
form.secretimmo_desc: Please fill out the evaluation request form to know your property's current value.
form.nextimmo_subtitle: Your property is not considered exceptional and could not be marketed off-market!
form.nextimmo_title: The good news is that through Nextimmo, our on-market sales partner, you can sell it effectively.
form.nextimmo_desc: Please fill out the evaluation request form to know your property's current value.
form.terms_label: By checking this box, you accept our Privacy Policy.

advantages_title: Advantages of launching the sale of your prestige property off-market with Secretimmo

advantages.title: A smooth launch to an exclusive and targeted audience 1
advantages.content: Present your property to a select group of partner agencies and our base of qualified active buyers, without immediate public exposure.
